original_text: Everyone must obey the laws of your God and also the laws of the king. If they do not obey, they deserve the right punishment. They may have to die. They may have to leave the country. They may have to lose their valuable things. They may have to go to prison.’
korean_text: 무릇 네 하나님의 명령과 왕의 명령을 준행하지 아니하는 자는 속히 그 죄를 정하여 혹 죽이거나 귀양 보내거나 가산을 몰수하거나 옥에 가둘지니라 하였더라

sentences.original_text: Everyone must obey the laws of your God
sentences.korean_translation: 모두는 당신의 하나님의 법을 순종해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: and also the laws of the king.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 또 왕의 법도 순종해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: They may have to leave the country.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 나라를 떠나야 할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: They may have to lose their valuable things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 귀중한 것들을 잃을 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: They may have to go to prison.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 감옥에 가야 할 수 있습니다
